TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XmlWriterSettings extends System.Object

summary.span: Specifies a set of features to support on the object created by the method.

span.span: Specifies a set of features to support on the object created by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是慣用的機制，以取得執行個體。The method is the preferred mechanism for obtaining instances. 方法會使用類別，以指定要在實作哪些功能所建立的物件。The method uses the class to specify which features to implement in the object that is created. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用物件方法，您應該使用屬性，以取得具有正確的設定物件。If you're using the object with the method, you should use the property to obtain an object with the correct settings. 這可確保建立物件具有正確的輸出設定。This ensures that the created object has the correct output settings. 類別提供屬性，控制資料一致性和輸出格式。The class provides properties that control data conformance and output format. 資料一致性檢查和自動更正，請使用這些屬性：For data conformance checks and auto-corrections, use these properties: |屬性Property|指定Specifies|值Value|預設Default| |--------------|---------------|-----------|-------------| ||是否要檢查的字元會在合法的 XML 字元集，如 W3C 所定義。Whether to check that characters are in the legal XML character set, as defined by W3C.|`true` 或 `false``true` or `false`|`true`| ||是否要檢查輸出是否格式正確的 XML 1.0 文件或片段。Whether to check that output is a well-formed XML 1.0 document or fragment.| （文件層級）、 （片段層級），或（自動偵測） (document-level), (fragment-level), or (auto-detection)| （文件層級的一致性） (document-level conformance)| ||是否要將結尾標記加入至所有未封閉的項目時呼叫方法。Whether to add closing tags to all unclosed elements when the method is called.|`true` 或 `false``true` or `false`|`true`| 若要指定輸出格式，請使用這些屬性：To specify output format, use these properties: |屬性Property|指定Specifies|值Value|預設Default| |--------------|---------------|-----------|-------------| ||若要使用的編碼方式的文字。Text encoding to use.| 值 value|| ||是否要縮排項目Whether to indent elements|`true` 或 `false``true` or `false`|`false` （沒有縮排）`false` (no indentation)| ||字元縮排時使用的字串 (使用的時機設為`true`)。Character string to use when indenting (used when is set to `true`).|StringString|兩個空格Two spaces| ||要用於分行符號的字元字串。Character string to use for line breaks.|StringString|`\r\n` （歸位字元、 換行字元）`\r\n` (carriage return, line feed)| ||如何處理新行字元。How to handle newline characters.| 值： （標準化） （取代），或（保持不變） value: (normalize), (replace), or (leave unchanged)| (所指定的字元取代) (replace with characters specified by )| ||是否要在個別行上寫入屬性 (不含任何時生效是`false`)。Whether to write attributes on individual lines (has no effect when is `false`).|`true` 或 `false``true` or `false`|`false`| ||是否要寫入 XML 宣告。Whether to write an XML declaration.|`true` 或 `false``true` or `false`|`false`| ## Examples 下列範例會建立，寫入至 XML 檔案，並寫入新行上的每個屬性。The following example creates an that writes to an XML file and writes each attribute on a new line. [!code-csharp[XmlWriterSettings.NewLineOnAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriterSettings.NewLineOnAttributes/CS/writenewlineattrs.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlWriterSettings.NewLineOnAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriterSettings.NewLineOnAttributes/VB/writenewlineattrs.vb#1)] 此範例會產生下列輸出：The sample produces the following output: ```xml 19.95 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`false`.`false`.| ||`true`.`true`.| ||`false`.`false`.| ||..| ||`Encoding.UTF8`.`Encoding.UTF8`.| ||`false`.`false`.| ||兩個空格。Two spaces.| ||`\r\n` （歸位字元、 新行）。`\r\n` (carriage return, new line).| ||..| ||`false`.`false`.| ||`false`.`false`.| ||`true`.`true`.| ## Examples 下列範例會建立用於縮排的定位點字元的物件。The following example creates an object that uses the TAB character for indentation. [!code-csharp[XmlWriterSettings.Indent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriterSettings.Indent/CS/writeindent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlWriterSettings.Indent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriterSettings.Indent/VB/writeindent.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Async { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether asynchronous methods can be used on a particular instance.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether asynchronous methods can be used on a particular instance.

value.span: 如果可以使用非同步方法，否則， 。

span.span: if asynchronous methods can be used; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須將此值設定為`true`當您建立新執行個體，如果您想要使用非同步該執行個體上的方法。You must set this value to `true` when you create a new instance if you want to use asynchronous methods on that instance. 在後會建立執行個體，屬性是唯讀的。After the instance is created, the property is read-only. 此屬性的預設值為 `false`。The default value of this property is `false`. 這個旗標會忽略多載。This flag is ignored by the overload. 這表示，如果您建立新根據現有，取決於輸入的非同步行為，而且您無法使用變更非同步行為的旗標。This means that if you create a new based on an existing , the async behavior depends on the input , and you cannot use the flag to change the async behavior.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CheckCharacters { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CheckCharacters : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the XML writer should check to ensure that all characters in the document conform to the "2.2 Characters" section of the W3C [XML 1.0 Recommendation](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml/#charsets).

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the XML writer should check to ensure that all characters in the document conform to the "2.2 Characters" section of the W3C [XML 1.0 Recommendation](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml/#charsets).

value.span: 表示執行字元檢查，否則， 。

span.span: to do character checking; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果物件支援的字元檢查，它會擲回例外狀況，W3C 的 < 2.2 字元 > 一節所指定的合法 XML 字元範圍以外的任何字元是否[XML 1.0 建議事項](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml/#charsets)。If the object supports character checking, it throws an exception if any characters are outside the range of legal XML characters specified by the "2.2 Characters" section of the W3C [XML 1.0 Recommendation](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml/#charsets). 字元檢查不包括檢查 XML 名稱中不合法的字元，或檢查所有的 XML 名稱有效。Character checking does not include checking for illegal characters in XML names or checking that all XML names are valid. 這些檢查是一致性檢查的一部分，並且一律會執行。These checks are part of conformance checking and are always performed.

The cloned object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 複製可以修改物件，而不會影響原始物件上的設定。The cloned object can be modified without affecting the settings on the original object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您想要寫入 XML 資料流，然後將額外的資訊新增至後資料流結尾時，此設定非常有用已完成寫入。This setting is useful when you wish to write XML to a stream, and then add extra information to the end of the stream after the has finished writing. 此屬性只適用於輸出 XML 的執行個體內容的資料流或，否則會忽略此設定。This property only applies to instances that output XML content to a stream or ; otherwise, this setting is ignored. ## Examples 下列範例會將 XML 片段寫入記憶體資料流。The following example writes an XML fragment to a memory stream. [!code-csharp[XmlWriterSettings.CloseOutput#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriterSettings.CloseOutput/CS/writestream2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlWriterSettings.CloseOutput#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriterSettings.CloseOutput/VB/writestream2.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::ConformanceLevel ConformanceLevel { System::Xml::ConformanceLevel get(); void set(System::Xml::ConformanceLevel value); };
member this.ConformanceLevel : System.Xml.ConformanceLevel with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the level of conformance that the XML writer checks the XML output for.

span.span: Gets or sets the level of conformance that the XML writer checks the XML output for.

value.span: 其中一個指定一致性層級 (文件、片段或自動偵測) 的列舉值。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the level of conformance (document, fragment, or automatic detection).

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 屬性會設定 XML 寫入器，以檢查並確保所寫入的資料流遵守一組特定規則。The property configures the XML writer to check and guarantee that the stream being written complies with a certain set of rules. XML 資料可以檢查以查看它符合格式正確的 XML 1.0 文件或文件片段的規則。The XML data can be checked to see that it conforms to the rules for a well-formed XML 1.0 document or a document fragment. 下表描述三個設定。The following table describes the three settings. 預設為文件層級一致性。The default is document-level conformance. |設定Setting|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||可確保 XML 輸出符合[語式正確的 XML 1.0 文件規則](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml/#sec-well-formed)，並且可以處理任何符合的處理器。Ensures that the XML output conforms to the [rules for a well-formed XML 1.0 document](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml/#sec-well-formed) and can be processed by any conforming processor.

文件一致性檢查包含大部分的片段層級檢查，並也請確定下列：The document conformance checks include most of the fragment-level checks and also ensure the following:

-最上層項目沒有 XML 宣告、 DTD、 項目、 註解、 泛空白字元或處理指示以外的任何節點。- The top-level item doesn't have any nodes other than XML Declaration, DTD, element, comment, white space, or processing instruction.
-XML 資料都只能有一個最上層項目節點。- The XML data has one and only one top-level element node.

XML 寫入器不會剖析 DTD 資訊寫入。The XML writer doesn't parse DTD information that is written. 使用者會負責確保 DTD 格式正確的。The user is responsible for ensuring that the DTD is well-formed.| ||可確保 XML 輸出符合[語式正確的 XML 1.0 文件片段的規則](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml/#wf-entities)。Ensures that the XML output conforms to the [rules for a well-formed XML 1.0 document fragment](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml/#wf-entities).

此設定可接受的最上層有多個根項目或文字節點的 XML 資料。This setting accepts XML data that has multiple root elements or text nodes at the top level. 此檢查層級可確保任何處理器都可使用做為 XML 1.0 外部剖析實體讀取的資料流。This level of checking ensures that any processor can consume the stream being read as an XML 1.0 external parsed entity.

在文件片段，不允許 DTD 資訊。DTD information isn't allowed in document fragments.| ||指定的 XML 寫入器應該決定根據內送資料的一致性檢查的層級。Specifies that the XML writer should determine the level of conformance checking based on the incoming data. 當您不知道是否格式正確的 XML 文件或片段，將會產生的 XML 時，此設定很有用。This setting can be useful when you don't know whether the generated XML will be a well-formed XML document or a fragment.

文件一致性檢查適用於下列情況：Document conformance checking is applied in the following cases:

-如果呼叫方法。- If the method is called.
-如果寫入 DTD 資訊。- If DTD information is written.

如果 XML 資料包含其中一種，則會套用片段一致性檢查：Fragment conformance checking is applied if the XML data contains one of these:

根層級的文字、 CDATA 或 EntityReference 節點。- Text, CDATA, or EntityReference node at the root level.
-多個項目根層級。- More than one element at the root level.
-沒有根層級的項目。- No element at the root level.

如果出現衝突 (如當您嘗試在根層級寫入 Text 節點及 DTD 時)，則會擲回 。An is thrown if there is a conflict, such as when you try to write a text node and a DTD at the root level.

如果您包裝其他物件，則外部物件不會執行任何其他的一致性檢查，這會保留給基礎的物件。If you are wrapping another object, the outer object doesn't do any additional conformance checking; this is left to the underlying object.| 如果 XML 寫入器偵測到違反指定的一致性層級的任何資訊，它會擲回例外狀況。If the XML writer detects any information that would violate the specified level of conformance, it throws an exception. 在某些情況下，XML 寫入器會自動修正一致性錯誤。In some cases, the XML writer automatically corrects the conformance error. 比方說，寫入器會關閉未封閉的屬性，而不擲回例外狀況。For example, the writer closes an unclosed attribute without throwing an exception. 下表顯示不同的合規性違規的處理中的每個設定。The following table shows how various conformance violations are handled in each setting. |條件Condition|||| |---------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |找到的 DTD 資訊。DTD information is found.|不是違反這項設定。Not a violation for this setting. 不過，XML 寫入器並不會檢查 DTD;使用者必須確保 DTD 格式正確。However, the XML writer doesn't check the DTD; the user must ensure that the DTD is well-formed.| 會擲回。 is thrown.|套用文件一致性檢查。Document conformance checking is applied.| |呼叫 。 is called.|不會視為違規情形，這項設定。Not considered a violation for this setting.| 會擲回。 is thrown.|套用文件一致性檢查。Document conformance checking is applied.| |多次呼叫 。 is called multiple times.| 會擲回。 is thrown.| 會擲回。 is thrown.| 會擲回。 is thrown.| |文字值會出現在最高層級 （不是下方的項目或屬性的節點）。A text value appears at the top level (not below an element or attribute node).| 會擲回。 is thrown.|不會視為違規。Not considered a violation.|套用片段一致性檢查。Fragment conformance checking is applied.| |多個項目或沒有項目會出現在最上層。Multiple elements or no elements appear at the top level.| 會擲回。 is thrown.|不會視為違規。Not considered a violation.|套用片段一致性檢查。Fragment conformance checking is applied.| |最上層項目是泛空白字元。Top-level item is white space.|不會視為違規。Not considered a violation.|不會視為違規。Not considered a violation.|不會視為違規。Not considered a violation.| | 不被呼叫來結束屬性節點。 isn't called to end an attribute node.|修正 XML 寫入器。Fixed by XML writer.|修正 XML 寫入器。Fixed by XML writer.|修正 XML 寫入器。Fixed by XML writer.| |XML 寫入器處於不正確的巢狀狀態 (例如呼叫後面)。The XML writer is in an improperly nested state (for example, a call is followed by a ).| 會擲回。 is thrown.| 會擲回。 is thrown.| 會擲回。 is thrown.| |最上層的項目是屬性。Top-level item is an attribute.| 會擲回。 is thrown.| 會擲回。 is thrown.| 會擲回。 is thrown.| |找到多個連續的文字節點。Multiple, contiguous text nodes are found.|不被視為發生違規，但要串連文字節點之使用者的責任。Not considered a violation, but it's the responsibility of the user to concatenate the text nodes.|不被視為發生違規，但要串連文字節點之使用者的責任。Not considered a violation, but it's the responsibility of the user to concatenate the text nodes.|不被視為發生違規，但要串連文字節點之使用者的責任。Not considered a violation, but it's the responsibility of the user to concatenate the text nodes.| |同一命名空間前置詞在一個項目中宣告兩次。The same namespace prefix is declared twice in an element.|XML 寫入器會產生新的前置詞，第二個命名空間。The XML writer generates a new prefix for the second namespace.|XML 寫入器會產生新的前置詞，第二個命名空間。The XML writer generates a new prefix for the second namespace.|XML 寫入器會產生新的前置詞，第二個命名空間。The XML writer generates a new prefix for the second namespace.| | 指定前置詞並在該範圍內未宣告的命名空間或前置詞是不同的命名空間相關聯。 specifies a prefix and a namespace that isn't declared within that scope, or the prefix is associated with a different namespace.|XML 寫入器寫入必要的命名空間節點。The XML writer writes the necessary namespace node.|XML 寫入器寫入必要的命名空間節點。The XML writer writes the necessary namespace node.|XML 寫入器寫入必要的命名空間節點。The XML writer writes the necessary namespace node.| | 指定前置詞和命名空間中，不該範圍內宣告。 specifies a prefix and a namespace that isn't declared within that scope.|XML 寫入器寫入必要的命名空間節點。The XML writer writes the necessary namespace node.|XML 寫入器寫入必要的命名空間節點。The XML writer writes the necessary namespace node.|XML 寫入器寫入必要的命名空間節點。The XML writer writes the necessary namespace node.| | 指定前置詞和命名空間，但前置詞為不同的範圍內命名空間相關聯。 specifies a prefix and a namespace, but the prefix is associated with a different in-scope namespace.|XML 寫入器會忽略指定的前置詞，並尋找正確的前置詞或產生新的前置詞。The XML writer ignores the specified prefix and either looks up the correct prefix or generates a new prefix.|XML 寫入器會忽略指定的前置詞，並尋找正確的前置詞或產生新的前置詞。The XML writer ignores the specified prefix and either looks up the correct prefix or generates a new prefix.|XML 寫入器會忽略指定的前置詞，並尋找正確的前置詞或產生新的前置詞。The XML writer ignores the specified prefix and either looks up the correct prefix or generates a new prefix.| | 用來撰寫使用不存在的命名空間範圍內的項目內容。 is used to write element content by using a namespace that doesn't exist within the scope.| 會擲回。 is thrown.| 會擲回。 is thrown.| 會擲回。 is thrown.| | 用來撰寫屬性內容範圍內使用並不存在的命名空間。 is used to write attribute content by using a namespace that doesn't exist within the scope.|XML 寫入器寫入必要的命名空間宣告。The XML writer writes the necessary namespace declaration.|XML 寫入器寫入必要的命名空間宣告。The XML writer writes the necessary namespace declaration.|XML 寫入器寫入必要的命名空間宣告。The XML writer writes the necessary namespace declaration.| |`xml:space`屬性不包含有效的值。The `xml:space` attribute doesn't contain a valid value.| 會擲回。 is thrown.| 會擲回。 is thrown.| 會擲回。 is thrown.| |發現無效的名稱。An invalid name is encountered.| 會擲回。 is thrown.| 會擲回。 is thrown.| 會擲回。 is thrown.| |`xml`前置詞未對應到 URI。The `xml` prefix isn't matched to a URI.|XML 寫入器並不會檢查這種類型的違規。The XML writer doesn't check for this type of violation.|XML 寫入器並不會檢查這種類型的違規。The XML writer doesn't check for this type of violation.|XML 寫入器並不會檢查這種類型的違規。The XML writer doesn't check for this type of violation.| |`xml`前置詞未對應到http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespaceURI。The `xml` prefix isn't matched to the http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace URI.| 會擲回。 is thrown.| 會擲回。 is thrown.| 會擲回。 is thrown.| |`xmlns`前置詞或區域名稱未對應到 URI。The `xmlns` prefix or local name isn't matched to a URI.|XML 寫入器並不會檢查這種類型的違規。The XML writer doesn't check for this type of violation.|XML 寫入器並不會檢查這種類型的違規。The XML writer doesn't check for this type of violation.|XML 寫入器並不會檢查這種類型的違規。The XML writer doesn't check for this type of violation.| |`xmlns`前置詞或區域名稱未對應到http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlnsURI。The `xmlns` prefix or local name isn't matched to the http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns URI.| 會擲回。 is thrown.| 會擲回。 is thrown.| 會擲回。 is thrown.| ## Examples 下列範例會將 XML 片段寫入記憶體資料流。The following example writes an XML fragment to a memory stream. [!code-csharp[XmlWriterSettings.CloseOutput#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriterSettings.CloseOutput/CS/writestream2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlWriterSettings.CloseOutput#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriterSettings.CloseOutput/VB/writestream2.vb#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to indent elements.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to indent elements.

value.span: 在新行和縮排上寫入個別項目否則， 。

span.span: to write individual elements on new lines and indent; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性只適用於執行個體的輸出文字的內容; 否則會忽略此設定。This property only applies to instances that output text content; otherwise, this setting is ignored. 項目縮排，只要元素未包含混合的內容。The elements are indented as long as the element does not contain mixed content. 一次或是呼叫方法以寫出混合項目內容，停止縮排。Once the or method is called to write out a mixed element content, the stops indenting. 縮排繼續一旦關閉混合內容項目。The indenting resumes once the mixed content element is closed. ## Examples 下列範例會建立用於縮排的定位點字元的物件。The following example creates an object that uses the TAB character for indentation. [!code-csharp[XmlWriterSettings.Indent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriterSettings.Indent/CS/writeindent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlWriterSettings.Indent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriterSettings.Indent/VB/writeindent.vb#1)]

span.span: This can be set to any string value.

value.span: 不過，若要確保有效的 XML，您應該只指定有效的空白字元 (例如，空格字元、定位字元、歸位字元或換行符號)。

span.span: However, to ensure valid XML, you should specify only valid white space characters, such as space characters, tabs, carriage returns, or line feeds.

value.span: 預設值為兩個空格。

span.span: The default is two spaces.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to normalize line breaks in the output.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to normalize line breaks in the output.

value.span: 其中一個 值。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 寫入文字內容或屬性的值時，會套用此設定。This setting applies when writing text content or attribute values. 每個值如下所述：Each of the values is described below: - 設定會告知取代新行字元，就不會否則保留正規化字元實體。The setting tells the to replace new line characters that would not be otherwise preserved by a normalizing with character entities. 這是用於輸出由正規化的反覆存取案例。This is useful in round-trip scenarios where the output is read by a normalizing . 當來回行程之後額外的正規化規則適用於屬性值`\t`，`\n`並`\r`在正規化時的屬性值中的空間就會被取代。Additional normalization rules apply for attribute values when round tripping since `\t`, `\n` and `\r` are replaced with a space in attribute values when normalized in an . - 設定會告知取代新行字元與`\r\n`，這是 Microsoft Windows 作業系統所使用的新行格式。The setting tells the to replace new line characters with `\r\n`, which is the new line format used by the Microsoft Windows operating system. 這有助於確保該檔案可以正確顯示的 [記事本] 或 Microsoft Word 應用程式。This helps to ensure that the file can be correctly displayed by the Notepad or Microsoft Word applications. 這項設定也會使用以保留字元的字元實體取代屬性中的新行。This setting also replaces new lines in attributes with character entities to preserve the characters. 這是預設值。This is the default value. - 設定會告知保持不變的輸入。The setting tells the to leave the input unchanged. 您不希望任何新行時，會使用此設定。This setting is used when you not want any new-line processing. 讀取的輸出時，這是很有用，不會執行任何正規化 (例如使用預設設定。)This is useful when the output is read by an that does not do any normalization (for example, an with default settings.) 下表顯示的輸出方法時所輸入的值取決於提供屬性設定。The following tables show the output of the method when supplied with the input value depending on the property setting. 寫入文字內容時，資料表會顯示輸出，以及寫入屬性值時。The tables show the output when writing text content and also when writing an attribute value. `Text Node Value:` ||\r\n\r\n|\n\n|\r\r|\t\t| |-|------------|---------|---------|---------| |實體化Entitize|& #D; \n&#D;\n|\n\n|&#D;&#D;|\t\t| |取代Replace|\r\n\r\n|\r\n\r\n|\r\n\r\n|\t\t| |無None|\r\n\r\n|\n\n|\r\r|\t\t| `Attribute Value:` ||\r\n\r\n|\n\n|\r\r|\t\t| |-|------------|---------|---------|---------| |實體化Entitize|& #D; & #A;&#D;&#A;|& #A;&#A;|&#D;&#D;|&\#9;&\#9;| |取代Replace|& #D; & #A;&#D;&#A;|& #A;&#A;|&#D;&#D;|&\#9;&\#9;| |無None|\r\n\r\n|\n\n|\r\r|\t\t| > [!NOTE] > 寫入 CDATA 區段中，註解或處理指示中的內容時，有下列行為。The has the following behavior when writing content within a CDATA section, comment, or processing instruction. 新行永遠不會取代其字元的實體，即使屬性設定為。New lines are never replaced with their character entities, even when the property is set to . 這是因為在 CDATA 區段中，註解或處理指示中無法辨識的字元實體。This is because character entities are not recognized in CDATA sections, comments or processing instructions. 如果屬性設定為或，撰寫的文字節點的值時的行為是相同。If the property is set to or , the behavior is the same as when writing a text node value. 下表說明哪些正規化傳回每個輸入的泛空白字元。The following table describes what a normalizing returns for each white space input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 2.11 和 W3C 的 3.3.3 [XML 1.0 建議事項](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml/)。For more information, see sections 2.11 and 3.3.3 of the W3C [XML 1.0 Recommendation](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml/). > [!NOTE] > 正規化的讀取器可以是任何所建立的物件方法。A normalizing reader is any object created by the method. 這些物件一律會執行 break 正規化和屬性的完整正規化。These objects always perform line break normalization and full normalization of attributes. 物件也可以是正規化的讀取器，它是否屬性設定為`true`。The object can also be a normalizing reader if it's property is set to `true`. ||\r\n\r\n|\n\n|\r\r|\t\t| |-|------------|---------|---------|---------| |文字節點值Text Node Value|\n\n|\n\n|\n\n|\t\t| |屬性值Attribute Value|單一空格single space|單一空格single space|單一空格single space|單一空格single space|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性只適用於執行個體的輸出文字的內容; 否則會忽略此設定。This property only applies to instances that output text content; otherwise, this setting is ignored. 如果設為`false`，則會自動寫入 XML 宣告If is set to `false`, The XML declaration is written automatically 如果一律會寫入 XML 宣告設定為，即使設定為`true`。The XML declaration is always written if is set to , even if is set to `true`. 如果資料永遠不會寫入 XML 宣告設為。The XML declaration is never written if is set to . 您可以呼叫明確地寫出 XML 宣告。You can call to explicitly write out an XML declaration. ## Examples 下列範例會將 XML 片段寫入記憶體資料流。The following example writes an XML fragment to a memory stream. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會指定用來序列化輸出的方法。This property specifies the method used to serialize the output. 輸出可以使用 HTML 規則、 XML 1.0 規則等等進行序列化。The output can be serialized using the HTML rules, the XML 1.0 rules, and so on. 此設定會由 XSLT 處理器設定，且 Visual Studio 在內部使用。This setting is set by the XSLT processor and is used internally by Visual Studio.
